title: Can herbal and allopathic medicine be taken together?
description: Answer (1 of 6): There's nothing unique about herbal medicines. In my own medical career I've prescribed digitalis leaf and tincture of opium. In modern mainstream medicine, most medications of botanical origins are the purified active components (e.g. digoxin from Digitalis lanata, colchicine fr...
